name: Yvan's Quest
description:
Summary of the game:

Discover the independent game Yvan's Quest available for free. The game takes place in two different universes. A horror weekend with friends is planned for a young high school student named Nico. His mission is to find a horror book. As he searches every room in the school, he discovers a strange book. This one actually hides much more than a book that will make him live a unique experience and make him discover the truth...

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Platform: Windows

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Available languages (V-1.0.0):

English, Japanese

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Recommended configuration (subjective and based on testing on different computers).

4 GB of RAM minimum

At least Intel Pentium or AMD Ryzen 3

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Price:

Free

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Important: The game is free and will receive updates from time to time. If you liked the game, you can support me by making a small donation. Thank you for your support.

If you have a problem with the game or have a suggestion, you can contact me at:

nicolasragey@yvan-quest.com

I will try to answer you as soon as possible, but sometimes it can take a little time. Thanks for understanding.
